title: komancho
author: komancho
content: i use crypto trading (floki and zcash) rollbit.comi make over 20k usd in my account, but my account banned permanently i don't abuse anything and no multiple account just trading crypto.it's scam sitehttps://i.postimg.cc/v8PBtGTq/rollbit6.pnghttps://i.postimg.cc/7hgrcMDn/rollbit7.pnghttps://i.postimg.cc/W4nFRgpj/rollbit8.png

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: komancho on May 10, 2023, 07:27:35 AMi use crypto trading (floki and zcash) rollbit.comi make over 20k usd in my account, but my account banned permanently i don't abuse anything and no multiple account just trading crypto.it's scam siteQuoted to show the image perfectly so that anyone can view it without clicking on the link. By the by I do not think they have done anything wrong. That is not for trading the site is for gambling. You may convert for any reason but you cant use the site for regular trading. For that, you should use an exchange site. The trading option (converting option) is only to give facilities of the gambler of the site.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: OP, lock this thread as you have another exactly similar one with more traffic. Having two exact thread will just confuses people and made the resolution attempt less focused. The button to lock this thread will be on the bottom of the page, left side corner.
